content: --स्थानकं (in dramaturgy) intimation of an episodical incident, when instead of the thing thought of or expected, another of the same character is brought in by some unexpected circumstance; (यत्रार्थे चिंतितेऽ न्यस्मिंस्तल्लिंगोऽन्यः प्रयुज्यते . आगंतुकेन भावेन पताकास्थानकं तु तत् .. <ls>S. D. 299</ls>; for its different kinds, see <ls n="S. D.">300</ls> <ls n="S. D.">304</ls>).
